recipe.title: Salt and Water Tasting
instructions: Step 1: Taste the salt and water separately.
Step 2: Combine the salt and water in a small bowl and taste again.

recipe.title: Sardine and Banana Chocolate Pickle Bites
instructions: Step 1: Mix together sardines, bananas, and chocolate in a bowl until well combined.
Step 2: Add pickles to the mixture and stir until everything is evenly coated.
Step 3: Roll the mixture into small balls and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Step 4: Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipe.title: Sesame Crusted Chicken and Veggie Stir Fry
instructions: Step 1: Prepare the chicken and vegetables
Chop the onion, garlic, and ginger. Cut the chicken breast into thin slices.
Step 2: Make the sesame crust
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sesame oil, and 1 tablespoon of water. Stir in the chopped green onions.
Place the chicken breast in a shallow dish and brush the sesame crust mixture evenly over both sides of the chicken.
Step 3: Cook the chicken and vegetables
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Add the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Add the sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, and broccoli to the skillet and cook for an additional 4-5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Step 4: Serve
Serve the sesame crusted chicken and vegetables hot, garnished with additional chopped green onions and sesame seeds if desired.

issues: Unused ingredients: eggs, carrots, rice, chili flakes

recipe.title: Tofu and Veggie Rice Bowl
instructions: Step 1: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Step 2: Cut the tofu into small cubes and cook in a pan with some oil until golden brown.
Step 3: Add the vegetables to the pan and cook until tender.
Step 4: Serve the tofu and vegetables over the cooked rice.

recipe.title: Basil and Tomato Pasta
instructions: Step 1: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Step 2: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3: Add the tomatoes to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes until they start to release their juices.
Step 4: Stir in the chopped basil and cook for an additional minute.
Step 5: Drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the tomato mixture. Toss everything together until the pasta is well coated with the tomato sauce.

recipe.title: Chocolate Zucchini Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a 12-cup muffin tin with muffin liners.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, and eggs. Beat in the chocolate until well combined.
Add the grated zucchini and mix until just combined.
Spoon batter into muffin cups and bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
Let cool in the tin for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipe.title: Salmon and Avocado Quinoa Bowl with Spinach Eggs
instructions: Step 1: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Step 2: In a non-stick pan, cook salmon fillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step 3: In the same pan, add eggs and scramble them until cooked through. Set aside.
Step 4: In a separate pan, sauté spinach over medium heat until wilted. Add to bowl with quinoa and salmon.
Step 5: Serve the salmon and eggs on top of the quinoa and spinach mixture.

recipe.title: Spicy Chicken and Potato Stir-Fry
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 2: Season chicken wings with salt, pepper, and your desired spices.
Step 3: Add chicken wings to the skillet and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
Step 4: Add diced potato to the skillet and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until tender.
Step 5: Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.title: Turkey and Sweet Potato Cranberry Herb Roast

ingredients.item: fresh herbs (such as rosemary, thyme, and sage)

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Rinse the turkey breast under cold running water and pat dry with paper towels. Season inside and out with salt, pepper, and your choice of herbs. Place the turkey on a roasting pan lined with parchment paper.

Toss the sweet potatoes in a little bit of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread them out on a separate roasting pan and roast alongside the turkey for about 30 minutes, or until they are tender when pierced with a fork.

In a small bowl, mix together the cranberries, herbs, and a drizzle of olive oil. Spread them out on a separate baking sheet and roast for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cranberries are tender and lightly caramelized.

After 30 minutes of roasting, baste the turkey with its pan juices and continue to roast for an additional 20-25 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Let it rest for 10-15 minutes before carving and serving.
While the turkey is cooking, toss the sweet potatoes with a little bit of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Serve them alongside the turkey as a side dish.
Once the cranberries are done roasting, transfer them to a bowl and toss them with a little bit of olive oil and honey. Serve them as a sweet and tangy condiment alongside the turkey.

recipe.title: Cauliflower Chicken Cheese Bake
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2: Rinse the cauliflower and remove any leaves or stem. Cut it into florets.
Step 3: In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower until it resembles rice.
Step 4: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken breast, shredded cheese, and butter. Mix well.
Step 5: Add the cauliflower rice to the mixing bowl and toss until coated with the cheese mixture.
Step 6: Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the cauliflower is tender.
Step 7: Remove from oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
